args: Yes. Here, many dragons and people live\nalongside one another in harmony.
If you examine our lives here, I'm certain\nyou'll see a new path for our kinds.
Welcome home, darling! Are you tired?\nPerhaps I could make you some food,\nor draw a bath, ooooor...something else?
Flamewyrm! What in the name of all\ndragonkind are you doing in that form?!
...So you want to show him the sweet bond\nof passionate love that we share? Ooo,\nthat is a WONDERFUL idea!
Buh?! Er, no, that's not exactly what I—
Awww, you're EMBARRASSED! Just one\nof the many wonderful things about you.
...THIS is the possibility you were so eager\nto show me?
Er, well, it's one of them. But we have\nLOTS of other dragons here as well.
Let me give you the ol' ten-rupee tour.
Fydon! Felyx! It's time to eat!
Enough, you two. Slow down and chew\nyour food before you swallow.
They're, like, eating out of your HAND!\nOhmigosh, I can't even— I'm gonna barf,\nthat's so cute! Time for some pics!
Dude, shoot some grub down this way,\nyeah? I wanna get a selfie of me feeding\nyour dragon buds!
This is most unfair! If you permit Nadine\nof all people this boon, then you must\nallow it of me as well!
Calm down, both of you! My dragons are\non a very strict diet and can't just gorge\nat your whims!
You gave 110 percent to that smithing,\nbut you gotta be a total forge rat if you\nwant to be the BEST OF THE BEST!
Daily discipline and steady practice will be\nthe coal that feeds the fire of your skill!
Ha! I couldn't help but overhear—and if\nit's training you require, leave it to me!
I'll use my knight's-armsmaster training to\nraise the standard of your blacksmithing by\nmaking your muscles ROCK HARD!
That's right. Muscles are the foundation\nof everything. Now, all of you line up!\nYou too, bear! Get in there!
Bear... Wait, do you mean ol' Coach?!
Look sharp, you four, because you're in\nMY world now! So let's get started with\nyour extra-special training!
Well? What are your impressions of the\npeople and dragons you've seen so far?
Perhaps there is something to the prince's\nassertion that humans and dragons might\nlive in peace and harmony.
I wonder if my hate for human actions\ncaused my own viewpoint to narrow.
I once believed humans required dragons'\nintervention to live prosperous lives...
I told you before, there's some truth in\nwhat you'd been saying about humans.
GUYS! BAD! REALLY BAD! SO BAD!\nSO, SO, SO, SOOOOOO BAD!
Those Empire goons are back, and they're\nheaded straight for a nearby village!
We have to help them. To arms, everyone!
Well, well. It seems we have a chance to\nsee one of your ＂ugly conflicts＂ for\nourselves. Shall we?
